info.author: Michael Kluge
info.description: ChIPSeeker can be used to visualize called peaks in ChIP-seq data

param.name: bedFiles
param.description: path to *.bed or *.narrowPeak files that contain called peaks

param.name: annoDb
param.description: name of the R genome annotation database (e.g .org.Hs.eg.db)

param.name: txdb
param.description: file or name of R library containing transcript-related features of a particular genome (e.g. TxDb.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg38.knownGene)

param.name: outputDir
param.description: path to an output folder in which the plots will be stored

param.name: promotorUpstream
param.description: size in bp used to define the promotor region upstream of the annotated TSS (transcription start site)

param.name: promotorDownstream
param.description: size in bp used to define the promotor region downstream of the annotated TSS (transcription start site)

param.name: resample
param.description: number of resample iterations for confidence interval estimation

var.name: ChIPSeekerOutputFolder
var.description: path to the output folder containing the plots
